LanguageData.Deviljholetter: 恶魔之踵进入了这个地区They will roam the region, hunting everything in the area.\n\n They can't pass doors, so if you stay behind walls you should be safe.They won't attack inactive turrets, so turn your turrets off if you want to save them.（它们不会攻击未激活的炮塔，所以如果你想救它们，就关掉你的炮塔） They'll leave the area in a few days.
